metadata.name: ⚔ Knighthood ⚔
metadata.description:
PREFACE

She dedicated her life to unification and the establishment of peace and justice. Having won all the wars, she considers her mission accomplished. However, the kingdom is attacked by a villain seeking to seize its lands.
Risking her life, the brave Julia rushes to the defense of King PEPE...

CHAPTER 1 - Dedication of the brave Julia to the Order of PEPE.

Entering the hall decorated with gold and emeralds, I immediately noticed the frescoes on the windows. I didn't have time to find out their secret because King PEPE had to knight me. Most of all, I was overwhelmed with emotions from the large number of valiant knights who were next to us.
During the initiation, I felt a great power that was transmitted to me from the sword of King PEPE. However, I understood the dangers and difficulties that awaited me and my loyal knights of the order...
